name: tamer
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who tames something that is wild, especially an animal: a lion-tamer See
tame
More examplesFewer examplesI worked with tigers as a trainer, never a tamer. The book was entitled "The Dragon Tamers".He's like a lion tamer who cracks his whip and all the cats go back on the stools.
